attributes.action: Provide real assistance for parents of multiples who aren't eligible for benefit
attributes.background: The costs of raising multiples (twins or greater) within the current legislation re benefits & tax credits for parents who aren't entitled to universal credit is unaffordabily high. Help is needed to allow parents to stay in work and afford child care which can be approx £50 per child per day.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what assistance you would like the Government to provide.
